meanings.definition: A person who is excessively sentimental or emotional.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother is a sentimentalist who cries at every sad movie.
meanings.sent2: The sentimentalist kept all the love letters from her high school sweetheart.
meanings.sent3: The sentimentalist couldn't help but tear up at the sight of a puppy in a bow tie.
meanings.sent4: She was such a sentimentalist that even a simple sunset brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent5: As a sentimentalist, he cherished every moment spent with his family.

meanings.definition: A person who is prone to indulging in sentimentality.
meanings.sent1: Being a sentimentalist, she always kept old photographs and letters.
meanings.sent2: The sentimentalist loved to reminisce about the good old days.
meanings.sent3: The sentimentalist found herself getting emotional over a broken cookie.
meanings.sent4: He was a sentimentalist at heart, finding beauty in the simplest of things.
meanings.sent5: As a sentimentalist, she treasured sentimental gifts more than anything else.
